entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 9:19AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...SECOND RELEASE ON MENDENHALL LAKE AND RIVER HAS STARTED... GAGE DATA AND IMAGERY FROM SUICIDE BASIN INDICATE THAT A SECOND RELEASE FROM THAT BASIN HAS STARTED. WATER LEVELS IN THE BASIN WERE ESTIMATED TO BE ABOUT A QUARTER AS HIGH AS WHAT WAS OBSERVED AT THE START OF THE PRIMARY RELEASE EARLIER THIS MONTH. entry.summary: ...Periods of Heavy Rainfall over Brooks Range and North Slope... Recent heavy rains over the Brooks Range and North Slope will see more rainfall through Sun night. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 2:32PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf Through Monday Morning... Elevated surf is expected through this weekend with onshore winds. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 2:32PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Heavy Rainfall over the Brooks Range and Upper Kobuk Valley... Another front will move into the Brooks Range tonight with heavy rainfall continuing into Monday morning. An additional 1 to 2 inches of rainfall is possible. Streams and rivers will likely see sharp rises with some small stream flooding possible. Residents with items near river and stream edges should monitor
